languages.text: "Наконец-то..." {n}Звонкий голос, преследовавший вас на палубе, звучит, кажется, отовсюду, пробирая до самых костей.{/n} "Наконец-то мы встретились, мое бедное дитя. Взгляни на него, смертный — он жаждет вернуться к той, чью ласку его род столь упрямо отвергает. Иди же. Иди же на мой голос, и мой Принц дарует тебе все блаженства и страдания этой вселенной".

traits.locale_text: "Наконец-то..." {n}Звонкий голос, преследовавший вас на палубе, звучит, кажется, отовсюду, пробирая до самых костей.{/n} "Наконец-то мы встретились, мое бедное дитя. Взгляни на него, смертный — он жаждет вернуться к той, чью ласку его род столь упрямо отвергает. Иди же. Иди же на мой голос, и мой Принц дарует тебе все блаженства и страдания этой вселенной".
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."
languages.original_text: "Наконец-то..." {n}Звонкий голос, преследовавший вас на палубе, звучит, кажется, отовсюду, пробирая до самых костей.{/n} "Наконец-то мы встретились, мое бедное дитя. Взгляни на него, смертный — он жаждет вернуться к той, чью ласку его род столь упрямо отвергает. Иди же. Иди же на мой голос, и мой Принц дарует тебе все блаженства и страдания этой вселенной".

languages.text: « Enfin... » {n}La voix vibrante qui vous a {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} sur le pont tout au long de votre périple semble provenir de toutes les directions ; un frisson glaçant vous parcourt l'échine.{/n} « Nous nous rencontrons enfin, {mf|mon|ma} pauvre enfant. Regardez-le, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Voyez comme il se languit de retrouver les caresses de celle que son peuple rejette si obstinément. Venez, mon enfant. Suivez ma voix, et mon Prince vous offrira toute la béatitude et la souffrance de l'univers. »
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: « Enfin... » {n}La voix vibrante qui vous a {mf|accompagné|accompagnée} sur le pont tout au long de votre périple semble provenir de toutes les directions ; un frisson glaçant vous parcourt l'échine.{/n} « Nous nous rencontrons enfin, {mf|mon|ma} pauvre enfant. Regardez-le, {mf|mortel|mortelle}. Voyez comme il se languit de retrouver les caresses de celle que son peuple rejette si obstinément. Venez, mon enfant. Suivez ma voix, et mon Prince vous offrira toute la béatitude et la souffrance de l'univers. »
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: 「ようやく…」{n}デッキを通るあなたを追ってきた声は、あらゆる方向から大きく鳴り響き、あなたを骨の髄まで凍らせる。{/n}「ようやく会えたのね、哀れな我が子。見なさい、人間よ。同族がその抱擁をかたくなに拒む者の元へと帰りたいと切望するその姿を。こちらへ来るのです。私の声に従いなさい。そうすれば、私の皇子は、この宇宙のすべての至福と苦痛をあなたに与えるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: 「ようやく…」{n}デッキを通るあなたを追ってきた声は、あらゆる方向から大きく鳴り響き、あなたを骨の髄まで凍らせる。{/n}「ようやく会えたのね、哀れな我が子。見なさい、人間よ。同族がその抱擁をかたくなに拒む者の元へと帰りたいと切望するその姿を。こちらへ来るのです。私の声に従いなさい。そうすれば、私の皇子は、この宇宙のすべての至福と苦痛をあなたに与えるでしょう」
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: “终于……”{n}当你穿过甲板时，周围的声音一直回荡在你耳边，听起来仿佛来自四面八方。这不禁令你毛骨悚然。{/n}“我们终于见面了，我可怜的孩子。看看他吧，凡人。尽管他的族人如此顽固地拒绝王子的爱抚，可他此刻是多么渴望回到王子身边。来吧，孩子。听我的话，我的王子会赐予你这世上一切痛苦与极乐。”
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: “终于……”{n}当你穿过甲板时，周围的声音一直回荡在你耳边，听起来仿佛来自四面八方。这不禁令你毛骨悚然。{/n}“我们终于见面了，我可怜的孩子。看看他吧，凡人。尽管他的族人如此顽固地拒绝王子的爱抚，可他此刻是多么渴望回到王子身边。来吧，孩子。听我的话，我的王子会赐予你这世上一切痛苦与极乐。”
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: "Endlich ..." {n}Die resonante Stimme, die dir auf deiner Reise durch das Deck gefolgt ist, kommt aus allen Richtungen gleichzeitig. Dir läuft es kalt den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Endlich begegnen wir uns, mein armes Kind. Seht ihn Euch an, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Seht nur, wie er sich danach sehnt, zu dem zurückzukehren, dessen Liebkosung seine Art so stur ablehnt. Kommt, Kind. Folgt meiner Stimme, dann wird mein Prinz Euch all die Glückseligkeit und all die Qualen dieses Universums schenken."
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: "Endlich ..." {n}Die resonante Stimme, die dir auf deiner Reise durch das Deck gefolgt ist, kommt aus allen Richtungen gleichzeitig. Dir läuft es kalt den Rücken hinunter.{/n} "Endlich begegnen wir uns, mein armes Kind. Seht ihn Euch an, {mf|Sterblicher|Sterbliche}. Seht nur, wie er sich danach sehnt, zu dem zurückzukehren, dessen Liebkosung seine Art so stur ablehnt. Kommt, Kind. Folgt meiner Stimme, dann wird mein Prinz Euch all die Glückseligkeit und all die Qualen dieses Universums schenken."
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: «Por fin...». {n}La voz retumbante que te ha seguido en tu viaje por el puente de mando parece provenir de todas partes a la vez, y un escalofrío te recorre los huesos.{/n} «Por fin nos encontramos, mi niño. Mírale, mortal. Mira cómo ansía regresar al seno de aquél cuya caricia es rechazada con tanta obstinación por los de su especie. Ven, niño. Sigue mi voz, y mi príncipe te concederá toda la dicha y el tormento de este universo».
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin...». {n}La voz retumbante que te ha seguido en tu viaje por el puente de mando parece provenir de todas partes a la vez, y un escalofrío te recorre los huesos.{/n} «Por fin nos encontramos, mi niño. Mírale, mortal. Mira cómo ansía regresar al seno de aquél cuya caricia es rechazada con tanta obstinación por los de su especie. Ven, niño. Sigue mi voz, y mi príncipe te concederá toda la dicha y el tormento de este universo».
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1

languages.text: "Sonunda." {n}Güvertedeki yolculuğun süresince yanında ayrılmayan yankılı ses, her yönden geliyor gibi durup iliklerine kadar ürpermene neden oluyor.{/n} "Zavallı çocuğum, nihayet karşılaştık. Bak ona fâni. Türünün, sevgisini büyük bir inatla reddettiği varlığa geri dönmeyi ne kadar arzuladığına bak. Gel çocuğum. Sesimi takip et. Prensim sana bu evrendeki tüm mutlulukları ve eziyetleri ihsan etsin."
languages.original_text: "At last..." {n}The resonant voice that has followed you on your journey through the deck sounds like it is coming from every direction, chilling you to the bone.{/n} "At last we meet, my poor child. Look at him, mortal. Look at how he yearns to return to the one whose caress his kind rejects so stubbornly. Come, child. Follow my voice, and my Prince will grant you all the bliss and torment in this universe."

traits.locale_text: "Sonunda." {n}Güverte boyunca seni takip eden yankılı ses, bütün yönlerden geliyor gibi duruyor ve iliklerine kadar ürpermene neden oluyor.{/n} "Benim zavallı çocuğum, nihayet karşılaştık. Bak ona fâni. Türünün büyük bir inatla reddettiği şeyi kucaklayan varlığa geri dönmek için ne kadar arzu dolu olduğuna bak. Gel çocuğum. Sesimi takip et. Prensim sana bu evrendeki tüm mutlulukları ve tüm eziyetleri ihsan edecektir."
traits.speaker: DemonSlaaneshMainDaemonette_MarazhaiQ1
